items.name: static let cacheIntermediates: CIContextOption
items.desc: An option for whether the context caches the contents of any intermediate pixel buffers it uses during rendering.

items.name: static let highQualityDownsample: CIContextOption
items.desc: An option controlling the quality of image downsampling operations performed by the context.

items.name: static let outputColorSpace: CIContextOption
items.desc: A key for the color space to use for images before they are rendered to the context.

items.name: static let outputPremultiplied: CIContextOption
items.desc: An option for whether output rendering by the context produces alpha-premultiplied pixels.

items.name: static let priorityRequestLow: CIContextOption
items.desc: A key for enabling low-priority GPU use.

items.name: static let useSoftwareRenderer: CIContextOption
items.desc: A key for enabling software renderer use. If the associated NSNumber object is true, the software renderer is required.

items.name: static let workingColorSpace: CIContextOption
items.desc: A key for the color space to use for image operations.

items.name: static let workingFormat: CIContextOption
items.desc: An option for the color format to use for intermediate results when rendering with the context.
